title: Add a TitleWhat is Double Jungle, and How Do You Do it?

replies.body: wow you're so cool for knowing something the pros do and act all high and mighty above others that you do it aswell to pretend you're a pro

I never sed or act like any of that I don't know what's your problem but go away. 
yes I do know this I'm trying to show people so that the team can get ahead this has been around for 3 maybe 4 months and yet its hard to get people to even understand how to do it so lay of.

you've been playing league too much you forgot what behaviour is socially acceptable and not. calling us nubs for not knowing double jungling is to criticise qualified yet still in-training students/trainees about not knowing every single thing about their selected career choice. realistically this strategy isnt even that much of a high priority to expect like what....50% of players to know? only reason its utilised is to lessen the burden of a potentially annoying lane opponent usually by the kill pressure of whatever champion they picked. they're supposed to get more experience by getting 2 camps and tp'ing back to lane over the champ with the 1-2 waves of minions that hes got the experience from. right now the knowledge of double jungling is in its right place for its priority in solo q, only plat/gold+ know and utilise the strategy since they may actually have a better understanding of the pressure their lane opponent can exhert vs their own. the only reason that sliver of experience is so much more effective is because they plan to counter-exhert pressure potentially at level 6 or 2 or 3, anything with a slight but sharp powerspike that can increase their chances of higher damage output than their opponents

1: I play maybe 3 lol games a day after work if I am not doing what's below in three.

2: As for the dbl jg it gets your top lanner a big advantage as he she will go to lane with 4 to 5 pots and as you have just watched your jg gets to have high hp and gank.

3: I don't think you can say wether or not I have problems with being social as I go to many party's have a gf who also plays this game with me and many mates who are nice and respectful so don't try to Jude me as I know that I'm fine yes I have some down sides to me like any one being social is not one.

I spoke and spelt Chinese from the age of 1 to 16 before moving to gld so I am sorry if I do not spell or use grammar as well as some one who has lived in a country there whole life I have only been aboul to say this paragraph for about a 2 years  

and maybe you should go to a phycologist if you like to try and upset people as that is a series problem and I'm sorry but some kid cant upset me over the internet

oh sorry dude i had no idea- looking back I realize that i was being a dick and i shouldn't have taken out my anger that gathered on a completely unrelated subject out on you- i truly am sorry :/

just a note though-i see you often giving advice on the boards which is great :) but just be careful about how you word it as you can come across as quite harsh or rude sometimes

I hope you will accept my apology dude- I really am sorry
